Worcester.George Gabriel House:
The George Gabriel House is a historic Colonial Revival house located at 31 Lenox Street in Worcester, Massachusetts.


== Description and history ==
The 2-1/2 story timber-framed house has 12 rooms (5 of which are bedrooms), and was built in 1887 for George W. Gabriel, bookkeeper and later General Manager for George F Blake & Co. The house has a generally rectangular plan, with a dormer hip roof and front porch supported by Ionic columns.
